info.title: Doctaura API
info.description: API for managing clinic operations, doctor schedules, and appointments

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Bearer {token}"

parameters.name: clinicId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the clinic

parameters.name: patientId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the patient

parameters.name: doctorId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the doctor

parameters.name: Locale
parameters.description: User's preferred language (e.g., 'ar', 'en', 'fr')
